title: Investigate Pump Failure
description: A reliability engineer investigates the recent failure of a critical injection pump to understand the root cause and prevent recurrence.

tasks.description: Gather all data related to the failed pump, including its maintenance history, recent operational data, and failure reports.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete dossier for the failed asset is compiled.

tasks.description: Analyze the vibration data leading up to the failure to identify any anomalies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analysis shows a sharp increase in bearing vibration 48 hours before the failure.

tasks.description: Update the preventive maintenance strategy for similar pumps to include more frequent bearing inspections.
tasks.expected_outcome: The maintenance plan in the CMMS is updated with new recommendations.
